title: [Tuts Plus] Visual Effects Compositing in Adobe After Effects Vi
description:
[Tuts Plus] Visual Effects Compositing in Adobe After Effects Video Tutorial-KTR


PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Christopher Kenworthy
RELEASE DATE..: 2014.12.5
RUNTIME......: 2 hours
SOFTWARE.....: Adobe After Effects CC


About this course::

In this course, film-maker Chris Kenworthy will give you a hands-on introduction to visual FX compositing in Adobe After Effects CC, showing how an ordinary shot can be used to build an underground tunnel, complete with sparks, smoke, and an exploding metal grate.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction


2.Setting Up the Scene
2.1Tracking the Scene
2.2Creating the Walls
2.3Mask Blending
2.4Foreground Texturing
2.5Creating and Lighting the Ceiling


3.Modelling the Grate
3.1Creating the First Metal Bar
3.2Building the Model
3.3The Second Model
3.4Animating the Model


4.Creating Depth, Light, and Texture
4.1Creating Raindrops
4.2Adding Beams of Light
4.3Working With Difficult Shots
4.4Creating the Main Sparks Layer
4.5Adding Flashes of Light
4.6Adding Larger Falling Sparks
4.7Final Compositing


5.Conclusion
5.1Conclusion
